roleset.name: supervise

example.name: real
example.text: Standard Life Assurance Co. manages about #15 billion in UK institutional funds.

example.name: NP deed
example.text: The French filmmaker Claude Chabrol has managed another kind of weird achievement with his "Story of Women".

example.name: VP deed
example.text: Wilder has managed *trace* to get across the idea that Coleman will say anything to get elected.
